entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
